content.detailedDescription: It was about 10 pm on maryland's eastern shore. i was finished working for the evening and went out to my truck. it is exceptionally dark in this part of the country and even more so as i do not recall a moon last night. so there was an bright star which at first seemed stationary. it was far too bright to be anything i've ever seen in the sky, so i went in to get my binoculars. by the time i got it in sight i discovered it was moving, but rather slowly.  it passed low, probably 1000 feet, directly above me.  it was a large triangle with no tail red lights on one side green on the other, in the rear. the front had a huge spotlight that seemed to be able to shine down on the land. it was a warm light. it was relatively quiet for how close it was.  it sounded mostly like wind sheer. then it was out of sight. then i looked back in the direction i had originally seen it and i noticed a red light orbiting, almost dancing around, much higher but in the same general part of the sky. through the binoculars the second craft seemed oval or sphere shaped with rows of pulsing lights, blue, green and red. then i saw the first object headed back in the vicinity of the second object so that they were both in view if the binoculars.  the triangle craft passed the hovering craft.  the hovering craft continued to nimble around almost as showing off.  this was no helicopter. i assumed it was a training exercise on some new technology with nasa or something. i should have watched longer but was tired so went home to sleep.
content.summary: A bright starlike light in the sky captured my attention

content.detailedDescription: Every morning around 4-5:30am a very bright light shines in the south western area of detroit--towards ann arbor and farther south.  at first i passed it off as a plane but it would hover for a long time.  one time it was there about 1am, and after hovering in the sky it fly over the home and i then thought it must be a big plane.  then thought there are no aircrafts allowed to fly at 1 in the morning.  i have been getting up every morning to see if it is there and it is.  very strange.  this has been going  on for about two weeks.
content.summary: There has been a bright light shining for a few hours every single night between 4-5:30am.  at first i thought it was a star...But it moved and then stayed still...Then moved again.

content.detailedDescription: Mufon needs to contact me....I reported last night, this morning and again...There is a ring of dead grass on my property.........Someone needs to have a look......
content.summary: Dead grass in a ring

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, october 8th, at about 9:30 pm, i was at the intersection of southway blvd. and south webster st. in kokomo, indiana waiting for the light to turn green and saw out of the corner of my eye, a red-orange glowing object in the sky. the object didn't seem far away enough to be a plane, yet it was close enough to me that i thought for sure it was a lit-up balloon of some sort, but after it began to hover not far from my vehicle, i could tell it was an upside down teardrop shaped object floating at an angle. the object was floating in a diagonal direction towards the northeastern sky. it wasn't an airplane (too slow and wrong shape). it looked like an upside-down balloon that was glowing red-orange from the inside-out. the glowing part of the object was on the bottom and gave it a 3d spherical shape. then, i had to leave from the stoplight. i turned the car around, but the object was gone.
on october 9th (the following night), about 10 or 11 pm, i saw the same thing around the same area. this time it was further up in the sky and appeared to be moving faster at an angle going north and then making a curve going east. i turned around & went around the block and couldn't find it anymore.
content.summary: Red-orange, upside-down balloon-shaped object glowing from inside of bottom, out

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see this . i am just pasing the news to mufon. here are the sources of the info: *(four links moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).
 
pass the word. peace
content.summary: Mystery daylight shiny objects floating over manhattan spark ufo frenzy (video)

content.detailedDescription: At 2:00a.M.On oct 14 just outside cedar rapids ia my wife and i both became speechless.  a bright ball of light caught our eyes way up in the sky.  as we drove it moved rapidly straight down towards the ground.  just before it reached the ground it flashed brightly and then disappeared.  as we continued to drive we both tried to explain what we seen but could'nt.
content.summary: Light moving vertical
A large black object with vapor or mist around it just motionless in the sky for approximately 6 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and two daughters were at a nearby elementary school in englewood, co. on the swings at the playground when i had this impulse to look up.  when i looked up and to the se, i saw what appeared to be an object made up of six connected reflective spheres in a molecular type configuration.  the object appeared to be roughly 40 feet in diameter and was tumbling while travelling to the west. it was a nice smooth movement from east to west.  
     i was still on the swings while watching the object move.  i yelled to my wife to look in that direction to see it, but she didn't see anything. there was another parent there with their child and neither of them saw it either.  i was staring at it for about 30 seconds while i was on the swing with my daughter. there was no sound of any air traffic. i stopped so i could point it out easier for them, but when i stopped and took my eyes off of it for 3-4 seconds, it was gone.  their wasn't anything in the way to obscure it and its direction of travel didn't have a place for it to be hidden.  it was just gone.  
     i was frustrated since no one else saw it and i know i did.  we then stayed at the park for another 5 or so minutes and decided to head home to the south.  while riding our bikes home we heard a low flying helicopter and looked towards the east south east and saw a green military helicopter in the exact same area doing a hard bank with its skids towards us.  it went down behind the trees towards the east south east in a quick manner.  the bank was so tight that all we saw were the panels on the bottom of the heli.  we have never seen one of these helicopters this low and in a bank in the metro area. 
     i haven't thought much of the event since, but last night when i saw the abc news affiliate in nyc had filmed objects over the city, one of the videos shows the exact same object i saw.  i was completely floored when i saw the object in ny.  i woke up my wife and showed her the video of the object.  without "leading the witness", i asked her what the object looked like.  she said, "it looks just like the object you described a few weeks ago at the playground".  i have watched the video many times now and i am convinced it is the same thing i saw. the abc footage is on youtube at this url: *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg). the object is seen at the 1:05 mark.  the tumble and shape are the same as what i had witnessed.
content.summary: Six connected spheres similar to a molecule travelling west while tumbling over residential neighborhood followed by military helicopter that went down in the area.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on the 30 bypass between exton and downingtown,when i noticed a bright metalic light ahead of me in the sky. as i got closer to it and looked up in appeared to be a triangular shaped metalic object just spinning around stationary. it was not a plane or a helicopter thats for sure. i don't know what it was.  i thought to myself other people have had to have seen this as well. i looked in the paper this morning, but did not see any mention of this.  maybe people saw it but only told people they knew about it.  it was pretty weird.
content.summary: Metalic triangle

content.detailedDescription: I in the car beside my girl when i saw an object in the sky going downwards followed by maybe smoke. as we rode on i could see a couple more going in different directions. the closeup pic i zoomed in and the other i didn't touch. after about twenty minutes i could no longer see because of trees. i didn't feel shocked because this was my third time seeing a ufo
content.summary: Disk shaped objects going downward followed by trail of smoke and the other going in weird patterns

content.detailedDescription:
While on the phone, i witnessed my first ever ufo at 8:40 pm in grandview, mo on october 13th. the v- shaped aircraft was flying low. (1000 ft at the most. app. 750 ft) it seemed to be smoothly gliding like a b-2 stealth bomber. it was flying slow (200 mph app.) it had large low glowing lights emitting a warm, not shiny, light. it had no tail, cockpit, or visible engines. just a thin black v. 
ive seen b-2 stealth bombers. i live an hour from whitemans airforce base. i looked up a f-117. not even close. although it made no sound at all it was not a stealth bomber. just a v.
i noticed it because it was fairly large. app. 100 yards across. it flew strait northwest to southeast. i lost sight of the object behind a trees leaves from my balcony. the first thing i said while i was on the phone was, "i just saw my first ufo...Dang... what is that? i hung up and tried to look up any v shaped aircraft on the internet. the closest thing to it was the phoenix lights incident.
i have never seen lights underneath an aircraft like this before.
almost yellowish, these large circular lights gave me the feeling it was very advanced technology. maybe electromagnetic capabilities. i would understand if the government wanted to keep this thing secret. it looked like nothing i had ever seen before. there is a new nuclear installation being built in south kansas city at the old richards gebaur airport.
content.summary: V shaped with around 5 big low glowing lights underneath. flying low and slow.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were cleaning up after dinner.  she was emptying the dishwasher, stood up and said "what's that?" pointing to a green light between the leyland cypress trees in our back yard.  i saw the light, stepped over to the door and out onto the back porch.  dark night.  i thought a plane was landing in the field, or maybe a helicopter.  the light passed our trees and was behind the neighbor's house as another green light appeared between the trees.  this green light had a red flashing light adjacent to it.  i stepped off of the porch and hurried over to the neighbor's fence where there were no trees so i could get a better look.  looked at my blackberry, it was 8:10 pm.  something wasn't making sense - and i realized there was no sound.  nothing like a plane 100 yards away.  certainly nothing like a helicopter flying by 100 yards away.  i watched both of the lights and it just didn't register.  there was a long black box between the 2 sets of lights.  maybe 100 to 150 feet long.  if it was an airplane after the front of it passed i shouldn't have been able to see the front lights but i still could.  later i wondered if the lights were on one side.  whatever it was it was moving rapidly.  within a minute it was out of sight.  i emailed my neighbors to ask if anyone else had seen it but so far i can find no one that has.
content.summary: Floating 30 to 50 feet over field behind my house moving westward

content.detailedDescription:
on sept.30th, i witnessed a strange object in the sky. so the next night which was october 1st, i went outside to see if i could see anything unusual again. my 6 year old daughter and i were watching the sky when i noticed a faint star-like object just as we had the night before. this time the object seemed a bit larger and a bit brighter,which made me believe it was closer to us than the previous night. another difference was that this object was traveling really slow. it followed the same path of west to east as the previous night. it looked just like a star with no flashing lights and no sound. this time however, as it was a little past where we were standing, it all of a sudden grew bigger and brighter. it may have been some kind of light that it turned on. that scared me because if it was a light, it seemed to be turned in our direction. after about 10 seconds, the light started to fade back to the original star-like appearance and it continued on until i coundn't see it anymore.
  now about 30 minutes later, i heard a helicopter and then i saw that it flew right over our house. as it was nearly directly overhead, it turned on a spotlight in the field and woods across our street. as soon as it got over this area, they turned the spotlight off. it circled our area 3 times. it may have had nothing to do with what i saw, but i thought it was worth mentioning.
content.summary: I saw a star-like object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
my 6 year old daughter and i were outside walking when we saw a shooting star. we decided to sit outside to see if we could see anymore. then at 7:35pm, i noticed what i at first thought was a faint star. it seemed to be moving and as i watched, it picked up alot of speed. it was going at least 3 to 4 times faster than the fastest airplane i've seen. my first thought was that it was a shooting star, but those are usually alot brighter, they disappear very fast, and they arch with a trail behind them. this object was perfectly round and faint, with no trail of light, and it was traveling perfectly straight, from the west to the east. right before it left my line of sight, it suddenly and without slowing down, turned right at a perfect angle, then vanished.
  there were no flashing lights and no sound. it looked exactly like a faint star in both size and color. 
  i tried to come up with what it could have been,and if it had not made that sudden turn, i probably would have dismissed it as anything odd.
  the next night i witnessed something very simular at around the same time. i've decided to report it seperately because it was on a different date and there were a few differences.
content.summary: I saw a faint star-like object traveling at a very fast pace

content.detailedDescription:
i was outside of my house with my kids when i noticed a falling star, so i decided to stay out there to see if i could see anymore. at around 7:35pm, i saw what i thought was a faint star at first, but as i watched it, i saw that it was traveling at a very fast speed. i thought maybe it could be another shooting star, but it traveled straight instead of arching as most shooting stars. it also did not leave any kind of trail. 
 the speed of it was incredible,going at least 3 to 4 times faster than the fastest airplane i've ever seen. but the oddest thing was when it was nearly out of my sight, without slowing down, it made a sharp turn then just vanished. 
 i first saw it looking toward the southwest sky. it was traveling from the west to the east.
 i couldn't tell the shape of it. it looked exactly like a faint star in both color and size.
 i was so excited about seeing it so i stayed outside for another hour but didn't see anything else. but i did go back outside the next night and witnessed something simular.
 on friday,october 1,2010 at around the same time, i again saw the faint star-like object. this time it was traveling at the same pace as an airplane, or maybe a bit slower. it was a bit brighter and bigger this time and going in the same direction as the night before. as i watched it,it remained going perfectly straight. this time however,as it got closer to my line of sight, something happend. it grew and got very bright and bigger for about 4 seconds,then went back to the normal size. this really frightend me. i don't know if the craft actually grew bigger or if it happend to turn on a bright light. 
 i don't know what these objects were, but i've never seen anything like it. i've been paying close attention to the skies ever since i saw a ufo back in march that i reported to mufon.
content.summary: I saw a faint star-like object traveling at very fast rates of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
While coming home from work, as i turned onto shawnee mission parkway, there were four jets that were flying in formation.  they were not flying fast and they were really low, which is what first caught my attention.  it seemed unusual to see four planes flying in formation over shawnee, kansas, and even more unusual that they initially were not flying fast.  they were flying toward the west.  when i got onto shawnee mission parkway heading west, there was a bright "sphere" in the west that then caught my attention.  it appeared to be several miles away and at about a 30 to 45 degree angle off the horizon.  it did not appear to be moving in either a north or south direction.  it clearly was not moving in an easterly direction because it did not get any closer.  i kept trying to figure out what it was and to rationalize what it might have been.  my thoughts were all over the place regarding what it might have been.

as i got to neiman road, the jets were still flying slowly and were visible.  they appeared to be slightly to the south of shawnee mission parkway.  by the time i reached quivira road, the jets were suddenly out of my sight no doubt in part because of my also having to keep an eye on the traffic.  i don't know if they suddenly sped up or if i was just busier longer than i thought with paying attention to the traffic.  the next thing that i noticed after i did not seek the jets were jet trails in the sky to both the north and the south of the object.  

when i arrived at my destination at lackman and shawnee mission parkway in shawnee, the "sphere" was still clearly visible in the sky, but probably more at a 30 degree angle from the horizon than a 45 degree angle.  i stood in the parking lot watching it for about five minutes and it did not appear to be moving.  when i left the store, the object was still in the sky as i headed south on lackman.  by the time i got home, it was getting dark and the trees around my home prevented me from any further observation.

i had a vaguely uneasy feeling because of the jets, their pattern of flying, and the "sphere."
content.summary: Four jets flying in formation with sphere in the west

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was a bright light, i couldn't make out any shape but looking at it with binoculars it was perfectly round and looked dim.  the ufo started out being bright and over about 30 seconds it faded and stayed that way.  it was visible all night for most of the days and on the days when i would see it leave it would fade to black without moving erraticly.  the ufos would slowly move across the sky over many hours while slowly making very sudden fast short movements like small super fast circles then stopping on a dime then darting very short distances and going back and forth and up and down and all directions. 10/13/2010 when i saw multiple ufos one was close and the rest were far and they were all spread out across the sky, they were all a white light except one, one was multi colored like flashing christmas tree lights the closer they were the brighter. my mom and dad also saw them but only my dad saw one moving erratically, they don't have that good of eye sight. i took me several days before i decided they couldn't be man made crafts. two times on 10/13/2010 i tried filming the closest ufo but as soon as i would turn on the camera it would stop moving and just looked like a really close bright light so i didn't bother posting it on here.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo seen over 2 week period and on 10/13/2010 multiple ufos

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were on our way home from my fathers house this evening and heading south down his road i noticed what i at that moment thought was a plane or a helicopter, judging by the lights as it was dark out. we see several types of aircraft in the area because of the local air force base and airport as well as helicopters from the local hospital. i was having a conversation with my son and every few seconds looked back up at the lights, after several times, i decided this had to be a helicopter heading south(my same direction)toward the hospital and it wasn't moving fast away from me. at the end of the road i have to make a left, go down through a hollow and make a right onto belmont ave. heading south again. just after we got onto belmont ave. i looked back up and realized this thing is not moving because i'm gaining ground on it. i asked my son to look at this thing out the side window. neither one of us could figure out what this was as we drove up to it. i slowed down and we drove under this thing hovering in the air, both looking out the side windows. my best guess is that this object was 150-200' off the ground and at that height was about the size of a bus. it was cigar/blimp shapped, had a red 
flashing light at one end and a blue flashing light on the other, which up to this point seemed like normal aircraft lights to me but this thing had 3 square bright white lights through the center of it. when we were driving under it i couldn't decide if they where white lights or windows lit from the inside, so i asked my son, and he thought windows. we agreed with each other this thing was dark gray or black in color as we could just barely make out its shape against the dark sky but it seemed to be made of metal and we didn't notice any sound coming from it.
the lights from the business signs lit it up a little.
this thing was hovering in the same area for several minutes as i drove up to it and belmont ave. had traffic on it as well as rt.80, which crosses over belmont right where this thing was so someone else had to see it. 
the strangest part of this is after we had gone under this thing going about 25 mph. i looked for a place to pull off the road, we traveled about 20 yards and pulled into a parking lot, we both leaned over to look at it through the passenger side windows and it was gone. 
i live just down the road from were this happened so we flew home, got out of the car and scanned the sky for a few minutes again and saw nothing. we went into our house and told my wife what we had just seen and went back outside. my son and i stood facing north scanning the sky and comparing what we noticed about this object and he turned my attention to a cluster of bright lights in the distance to the north. they looked a lot like the lights i believed to be an aircraft earlier. i got out my cell phone and called my dad because they seemed to be in the area of his house, the lights were brite enough that he would definatly see them. i told him to go outside and look north in the sky for these lights, they seemed to be hovering in one spot. he put the phone down and as we waited for him to come back the lights descended as if they were landing, straight down slowly, till they disappeard behind rt 80. he came back and said he saw nothing so they must have been south of him, so in between our houses. 
my neibors noticed us and asked what we were doing so we told them the story and we all stood out in the street looking around and noticed there was a road crew working up on rt80 so its possible that they saw this thing or things if the second can be considered out of the ordinary.
after talking with the neibors about it for a few minutes i decided to check the time and it was 9:55pm.
we also noticed a few minutes later that there were quite a few planes in the air to the north, in the direction of the air base and they seemed to be circling the area north of rt 80 flying low.
i had my son draw a sketch of what he saw and i drew one of what i saw.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object hovering over belmont ave.

content.detailedDescription: I am fascinated by space and the stars so when i am outside at night i always look up. well as i lit my cigarette in the backyard of my house in clovis, and began to gaze up, i noticed a star-like object in the sky as i looked to the south east. it was flashing many different colors. (red, green, blue, purple, white) not only was it flashing colors, but it was pulsing, dimmer, brigter, dimmer, really bright, dimmer etc. at this point i knew i was definately not looking at a star or any type of airplane or helicopter. then i saw it do something i will never forget, it moved! it didn't just move it zig zaged down, and then shot up at a fairly rapid pace. i don't know of any man made aircraft which can hover, stop, and instantly change direction. it also could go from a very high rate of speed to a complete stand still. when i got over the intial shock, i ran inside and woke up my roommate *(name deleted--cms/sg). i was so excited i yelled and shook him rather hard. when he woke up he was terrified and upset that i woke him up so abruptly when he had school early in the morning. after he heard what i was yelling at him we both ran back out in the backyard. he even noticed the object moving and changing color without his glasses and turned right back around to run in and get them and a pair of binoculars. i stayed to keep an eye on it and he came running back out and was even more shocked when he saw it with his glasses. we both took turns using the binoculars for about 45 minutes and that's when we spotted the second one. it was more to the east than the first one we noticed. it was doing the exact same thing; pulsing, changing color, and making very erratic movements. however, this object seemed to be higher up. at about this time i had *(name deleted--cms/sg) go get the fresno air terminal security phone number. i called and spoke with a young man named **(name deleted--cms/sg) who said he could't get outside to see but he would phone the tower. the two officers in the tower did admit they had seen some strange blue/green lights, but they did not think they were threatening so they didn't investigate further. *(name deleted--cms/sg) had to go to bed because he had school so early. i continued to watch as i proceeded to call anyone and everyone of my friends and family to try and wake them up so they could see. unfortunately, nobody woke up and my webcam wasn't good enough to see anything on. i continued to watch for another hour then called fox 26 newsroom at 3:45 or 4am and spoke with a young lady. i was hoping they would have a camera handy, they did not. (i found that hilarious) about this time i noticed something even more shocking, i could see many more that were farther away (not higher). in total, i counted at least 9 or 10 different objects. the next day i contacted mufon and learned a local police officer had reported seeing the same thing! i felt so validated when i heard that, and that made up for all the crazy looks i'm gonna get telling this story. this was the most incredible night of my life, and i will definately never ever forget it. i know some people i talked to last night and today might not have completely believed me, but both (name deleted--cms/dr) and i know what we saw and we will tell anyone who will listen! we have a video camera tonight so bring it on!   (i am currently working on a sketch)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Went out for a late night cigarette and saw them!

content.detailedDescription: Went outside and saw a moving star like object wich got brighter then any star in the sky then left atmosphere heading south. while looking up saw a shooting star then about five more moving star like objects all going different directions. no blinking lights just looked like stars in the sky but moving.I had to return to work and about 1 and a half hours later returned to the same spot and saw nothing but stationary stars
content.summary: about 5 star like objects obove atmosphere moving  med-fast all different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside in the backyard, having a beer and smoking a cigarette. just staring at the stars and constellations. was almost done with my cigarette and was looking at a blue star just beneath orion. the star was slightly above the lower peaks to the east of albuquerque on the sandias. it was just about level with the star that marks orions right heel. i then noticed a bright star in the orion constellation. when i looked i saw a bright orange-yellow star just below the center star on the belt. as i focused on the star, it was steadily bright for 2-3 seconds. then it faded from view. it was as if someone had taken a dimmer switch and slowly just turned it off. it was completely stationary the entire time. it was there, where i new there shouldnt be a star, and then it just faded from view. i stood outside for at least an hour afterward staring at the eastern sky, and nothing else happened for the rest of the time i was out there. about 40 some minutes after, i saw 2 shooting stars about 5 mins apart. if what i saw was a shooting star it would have to have been coming directly at me, because it did not move at all. the object i saw was much brighter than any shooting star ive ever seen, and it was stationary. i was curious about it the moment i saw it, and when it started to fade from view i was filled with such awe and bewilderment that i dont believe it was a shooting star. ive been studying constellations since a very young age. ive been a stargazer for most of my life and ive never seen, experienced, or felt anything like that before.
content.summary: Bright star that faded from view

content.detailedDescription: I was outside to get some air when i noticed it in the sky. it was too bright and too close to be a star. i looked at it for at least an hour and a half. it seemed to have bright blue, what looked like feeler's coming off it. it also released what looked like small probes red and green in color. it seemed to track through the sky with slow short and abroupt movements. no air craft or blipms fly in the area i was looking at, also there where no identifying marker's on this object.
content.summary: Strong bright light. it looked like a star but was too close to be one.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car going from dublin to stephenville on hw 377 heading north.  about half way to stephenville i noticed a large white light to my left.  i looked over to see a disc shaped light lift from the ground and was moving to the north at a high rate of speed and then just blinked out.  

i never saw it again.  it was very fast and i'm not sure if it was on the ground or not but i think it was about 2 or 3 miles away.  its hard to tell in the dark.
content.summary: Disc shape light lifted from the ground level and took off

content.detailedDescription:
I was checking the maternity pen, and i was headed north on our land, and it just flew over headed north, making a direct line over our manure settling basin.

it was pretty dark, so the light caught my attention since it was out of the ordinary.

i thought it was a bird because sometimes there are white birds in the area. when i realized it wasn't, i thought it might be tractor headlights. but then i realized that it was something not ordinary.

it was just kindof streaming, no curves or turns, like a bullet or projectile trajectory, just constant smooth motion.

i wasn't scared, i was puzzled. if it wasn't moving so quickly i would've felt like pursuing it to see what it was.

it flew over the horizon, and i watched it as long as i could.
content.summary: Low flying bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my office. i thought headlights were coming around the bend in our road, but they never passed by. i looked out the bathroom window to see if my neighbor had parked his car in the field, and i saw a white light leave the field and head to the north. the object quickly left at horizon level until it blinked out.
content.summary: Light taking off to north

content.detailedDescription: Coming down 24th street west northwest quite obvious and shining brilliantly in a very clear night sky directly in front of us were the three orbs.I asked my girlfriend "do you see those orbs in the sky??"she said yes and dont start up about ufo's.Well what the hell are they then i said??They were occillating and the color of them was a deep orange,they were arranged in a slight curve with a good distance between each of them.I pulled over and got out my binoculars and looked at them,through the glasses i saw that they were actually going through color changes i couldnt detect with my naked eye,from orange to red to yellow then green.Well,then one split and i mean moved out like here then gone,like a tracer bullet,it went north,then another split west and one remained there in the sky but went higher in the sky and remained stationary.We then went home.
content.summary: Three spheres in sky west of goldengate at 2000 feet in slightly curved line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was woken from sleep at approximately 0245 local time. i got up and drank some water and went back to bed, but was very restless and got up again and looked out the windows of our house which face the western sky, which includes mount chocorua. initially i witnesses several lighted objects to the south of mount chocorua in relation to my viewing position that moved erratically within a small range of area, followed by what appeared to be a dim white firework pattern, followed by a point of light that initially moved very quickly to the south of mount chocoura, stopped and accelerated to what appeared a southerly direction and then climbed from a it's horizontal movement to a 60-70 degree angle to horizontal stopping at a position of approximately 30-35 degrees of angle from my perspective. 

subsequently, another lighted object which appeared to change color, moved into a position in close proximity to the aforementioned object. both objects appeared to 'dance' and moved to and from each other with smooth but quick acceleration and stops. 

eventually, the colored object moved from the the southwest to northeast, which was very quickly followed by the point of light which accelerated to a 8 o'clock position to the colored object, stopped and backed off just as quickly, followed by an acceleration back towards the colored object and began to once again dance around the colored object. both objects continued to move towards the northeast over the top of the house and out of my line of sight.
content.summary: Several lighted objects in movement

content.detailedDescription:
I was up in the hunter valley, a wine growing area of australia about half an hours drive west of the city of newcastle having a drink with friends at a hotel in the outdoor drining area that overlooked vineyards to the north with friends. 

about 9.50pm we notcie that ohtrher people were staring at a light up in the sky above the vineyards.

the object objecting in the sky was a blue to white light and also seemed to have smaller lights around it. we watched it for maybe 5 minutes then i went down to the car and got my camera out.  i filmed it in the video mode on my camera which was lumix tz10 for about 30 seconds, then stopped because it was hard to film becasue it was off in the distance above the vineyard and when i zoomed in it was hard to hold may hand steady so it was pretty shaky. so i stopped filming video to try and take some still photos to get a better picture of it. a minute or so later it had shot off really fast up into the sky. t was seen by about 30 or 40 people who were there out teh front of the hotel. i i never got to film it shooting off because i switched from filming video to taking photographs on my camera then it was gone. i have attached the best photo i took.

but it looks like someone elsee who was there got some video of the same ufo and caught it shooting off fast and has put it on youtube. it's hard to see but have a look at

*(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg)

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Weird blue and white lights hover above vineyards then shoot off up into sky at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
This event is on going and it looks like a cross section of an orange when it gets bright.  it then gets smaller and will look like three separate lights.  then it would come togetether and look like a spreading light of different colors.  i was notified by a relative since they saw it in the direction of where i live.  when i began looking at it with binoculars and moved to a spotting scope.  the object changed shape and color.  i am typing this while it is going on and don't have an exact duration yet.  i began watching at 20:45.

regards,

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Red, green, yellow flashing lights from one object.  would condense to one light then spred out.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in newport news/va.
12th night october -2010 (tuesday). i was driving back from hampton roads after having my usual hair cut at supercuts.
was driving on the highway at about 45miles/hr.I see this object the size of a sesna , still in the air , across the highway , in the wooded area.
i see it from some distance so i slow my vehicle to take a look and might be at a speed of 20miles/hr.
my vehicle dont have tinted glasses. so i was observing the features of the object in great detail. it did not occur to me that it may be a ufo .
but i looked at the object in great detail. it was not a chopper.
then i thought it may be a fighter jet standing still in air..But as i drove past it, i find the shape to be amusing. it has features extending below its body like a stand ,several of them.And there were lights around them.
i am certain that it was not a fighter jet due to its peculiar shape.
after i passed this object, i immediately realized it may be a ufo.
i took a u turn at the next signal. 15 seconds might have elapsed .
i took u turn and am back on the highway, but this object was not to be seen. i even had my cell ph camera turned on to capture any unusual sightings. 
then i turned back at next signal to get back home and passed this section of the road . there was nothing significant. but could see some sparks like flashes , very faint ones. just like electric sparks. but that was it
after i got home i spoke with my friend and sister about this.
i tried to convince myself that it is not a ufo.
but having seen this object in such great detail, makes me feel it is not a usual flying object . 
the area behind the highway is some what wooded. and there is no way a human operated vehicle could fly or stay still in air at such a low elevation
the elevation being 80% the height of a street light.

you may contact me on my email provided. but i dont think there is any traceable evidence.
but i would be curious to see if anybody has reported such sighting on same night. and btw this area is adjacent to few homes so it is very possible that someone living in those houses might have seen something and just ignored the fact

thanks
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Sighted an unidentified object standing still in the air about 100 ft away from me
